channel.title: LVS on 我的乐与怒
channel.description: Recent content in LVS on 我的乐与怒

item.title: LVS配置命令
item.description: DirectorServer ifconfig eth0:0 192.168.0.251 broadcast 192.168.0.251 netmask 255.255.255.255 up route add -host 192.168.0.251 dev eth0:0 echo "1" >/proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward realserver ifconfig lo:0 192.168.0.251 broadcast 192.168.0.251 netmask 255.255.255.255 up vi /etc/sysctl.conf net.ipv4.conf.all.arp_ignore = 1 net.ipv4.conf.all.arp_announce = 2 net.ipv4.conf.tunl0.arp_ignore = 1 net.ipv4.conf.tunl0.arp_announce = 2 2014-02-21
